channel.title: SteinsZeit
channel.description: Building things in R and Python

item.title: Web crawling with R part 1: Teaching rvest how to crawl
item.dc:creator: Stefan Stein
item.description: rvest is a great package for downloading information from the internet straight into your R session. However, it does not natively "crawl" the web, i.e. traverse from one website to another. So let's teach it! The code and the extracted hyperlink network data can be found in the corresponding [GitHub repository](https://github.com/stefan-stein/Wikipedia_webcrawling).

item.title: The list of things we all know we should know
item.dc:creator: Stefan Stein
item.description: Welcome to my new blog, SteinsZeit. I hope you enjoy reading what I have to say! For my first blogpost I have compiled a list of useful mathas and programming references and guides.
